name: compile-ui-jinja2
description: Compiles UI layout DSL into Jinja2 templates with HTML and CSS.

arguments.name: dsl
arguments.description: The UI layout DSL input using the syntax: <item1 item2> for horizontal, [item1 item2] for vertical, <?item1 item2> for responsive, and [#row1|row2] for grid layouts

output.code:
{{ header }}
{{ nav }}
{{ main }}
{{ footer }}

notes: The generated HTML uses flexbox and grid layouts
Each item becomes a div with an ID matching the item name
Items can have type hints using the syntax: item/type
The layout structure is preserved using appropriate CSS classes
